<p><strong>Diazo</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1w7pbl3"><strong>AUTO ACTIONS</strong></a> lets you automatically activate action groups, including RCS and SAS when you launch your vessel. Make sure you have ModuleManager installed or else you’ll miss out on the ability to throttle to a desired on vessel creation on a per-vessel basis, save settings on a per-vessel basis and more!</p>

<p>For more info on <strong>Auto Actions</strong> and how it interacts with the Action Groups Extended mod, go <a href="http://bit.ly/1w7pbl3"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
